body:
Hi everyone,




I am trying to install the BSDFViewer on a Lubuntu 64bit virutal machine in
VMWare. I have installed all the packages necessary for the compilation,
and making some changes in the install.sh, as suggested in this previous
post
http://radiance-online.org/pipermail/radiance-general/2015-February/010784.html,
I was able to compile and run the viewer. However, I still have a problem
with the visualization of BSDF with tensor tree resolution; please have a
look there https://www.dropbox.com/s/byi4gsdkuknoi5l/tensortree.png?dl=0 ,
the values of transmission are wrong.


On the other hand, the Klems visualization works fine.




Any help or advice would be apriciated.


Best,
*Giuseppe *
